keywords: ['pop song', 'bollywood song', 'male voice', 'backing voices', 'dance song', 'synth music', 'programmed percussion', 'bass', 'club song', 'tabla', 'moderate tempo', 'happy mood']
caption: This pop song features a male voice singing the main melody. Other voices sing backing vocals using the same melody. This is accompanied by programmed percussion playing a dance beat. A wave synth plays a repetitive melody. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. Toward the end of the song, a tabla is played. The mood of this song is happy. This song can be played in a club as a dance song.
